entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence late this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 this evening. Temperature rising to 8 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
